targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__time(timestamp), tasks AS "Tasks done"
FROM $dbname.GlobalWordCountHistory
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), SUM(seen_times) FROM $dbname.WordHistory;

SELECT 
  $__time(timestamp), 
  words AS "Words", 
  translations AS "Translations", 
  unique_translations AS "Unique Translations"
FROM $dbname.GlobalWordCountHistory
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $dbname.Words), COUNT(id), COUNT(DISTINCT translation)
FROM $dbname.WordTranslations

SELECT
  LENGTH(wt.translation) AS Length,
  wt.translation AS Translation,
  w.word AS Word
FROM $dbname.WordTranslations wt INNER JOIN $dbname.Words w ON wt.word_id = w.id
ORDER BY Length DESC

SELECT
  SUM(LENGTH(wt.translation)) AS `Total Length`,
  GROUP_CONCAT(wt.translation SEPARATOR ', ') AS Translations,
  w.word AS Word
FROM $dbname.WordTranslations wt INNER JOIN $dbname.Words w ON wt.word_id = w.id
GROUP BY w.id
ORDER BY `Total Length` DESC

SELECT
  LENGTH(w.word) AS Length,
  w.word AS Word,
  GROUP_CONCAT(wt.translation SEPARATOR ', ') AS Translations
FROM $dbname.Words w INNER JOIN $dbname.WordTranslations wt ON w.id = wt.word_id
GROUP BY w.id
ORDER BY Length DESC

SELECT
  LENGTH(w.shown_word) AS Length,
  w.shown_word AS Answer,
  GROUP_CONCAT(wt.translation SEPARATOR ', ') AS Translations
FROM $dbname.Words w INNER JOIN $dbname.WordTranslations wt ON w.id = wt.word_id
GROUP BY w.id
ORDER BY Length DESC

SELECT
  LENGTH(w.usage_example) AS Length,
  w.usage_example AS "Usage Example",
  w.shown_word AS Word
FROM $dbname.Words w
ORDER BY Length DESC

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS Count,
  w.word AS Word,
  GROUP_CONCAT(wt.translation SEPARATOR ', ') AS Translations
FROM $dbname.Words w INNER JOIN $dbname.WordTranslations wt ON w.id = wt.word_id
GROUP BY w.id
ORDER BY Count DESC

SELECT DISTINCT
  COUNT(DISTINCT wt2.word_id) AS Count, 
  wt1.translation AS Translation,
  GROUP_CONCAT(w.word SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Matching Words"
FROM       $dbname.WordTranslations wt1 
INNER JOIN $dbname.WordTranslations wt2 ON wt1.translation = wt2.translation 
INNER JOIN $dbname.Words w ON wt2.word_id = w.id
GROUP BY wt1.id
HAVING Count > 1
ORDER BY Count DESC;

SELECT 
  w.shown_word AS "Word", 
  w.usage_example AS "Example",
  wh.seen_times AS "Times seen"
FROM $dbname.WordHistory wh 
JOIN $dbname.Words w ON wh.word_id = w.id 
WHERE user_id = $user 
ORDER BY wh.seen_times DESC 
LIMIT 50;

SELECT 
  $__time(wh.last_seen),
  w.usage_example AS "Example",
  w.word AS "Word",
  w.shown_word AS "Answer",
  GROUP_CONCAT(wt.translation SEPARATOR ", ") AS "Translations",
  wh.word_id AS "Word ID",
  wh.seen_times AS "Times seen",
  (CASE WHEN wh.seen_times <= 2 THEN "warning" ELSE CASE WHEN wh.seen_times <= 10 THEN "info" ELSE "debug" END END) AS level
FROM $dbname.WordHistory wh 
JOIN $dbname.Words w ON wh.word_id = w.id
JOIN $dbname.WordTranslations wt ON wt.word_id = w.id
WHERE user_id = $user
GROUP BY wt.word_id
ORDER BY wh.last_seen DESC
LIMIT 50;

SELECT $__time(timestamp), tasks AS "Tasks done"
FROM $dbname.UserWordCountHistory
WHERE user_id = $user
UNION
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), SUM(seen_times)
FROM $dbname.WordHistory
WHERE user_id = $user;

SELECT 
  $__time(timestamp), 
  words AS "Words", 
  translations AS "Translations", 
  unique_translations AS "Unique Translations"
FROM $dbname.UserWordCountHistory
WHERE user_id = $user
UNION
SELECT 
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), 
  COUNT(DISTINCT w.id),
  COUNT(*),
  COUNT(DISTINCT wt.translation)
FROM $dbname.Words w
JOIN $dbname.WordHistory wh ON w.id = wh.word_id
JOIN $dbname.WordTranslations wt ON w.id = wt.word_id
WHERE wh.user_id = $user;

SELECT
    s.Hour AS "Hour",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`01` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`00`) AS "00",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`02` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`01`) AS "01",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`03` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`02`) AS "02",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`04` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`03`) AS "03",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`05` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`04`) AS "04",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`06` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`05`) AS "05",

    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`14` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`13`) AS "13",

    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`18` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`17`) AS "17",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`19` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`18`) AS "18",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`20` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`19`) AS "19",

    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`23` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`22`) AS "22",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`24` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`23`) AS "23",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`25` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`24`) AS "24",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`26` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`25`) AS "25",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`27` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`26`) AS "26",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`28` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`27`) AS "27",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`29` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`28`) AS "28",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`30` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`29`) AS "29",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`31` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`30`) AS "30",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`32` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`31`) AS "31",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`33` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`32`) AS "32",

    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`35` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`34`) AS "34",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`36` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`35`) AS "35",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`37` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`36`) AS "36",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`38` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`37`) AS "37",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`39` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`38`) AS "38",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`40` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`39`) AS "39",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`41` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`40`) AS "40",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`42` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`41`) AS "41",

    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`44` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`43`) AS "43",

    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`48` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`47`) AS "47",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`49` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`48`) AS "48",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`50` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`49`) AS "49",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`51` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`50`) AS "50",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`52` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`51`) AS "51",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`53` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`52`) AS "52",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`54` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`53`) AS "53",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`55` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`54`) AS "54",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`56` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`55`) AS "55",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`57` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`56`) AS "56",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`58` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`57`) AS "57",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`59` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`58`) AS "58",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`next` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`59`) AS "59"
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            s.seq AS "Hour",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 0, 0) AS "00",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 1, 0) AS "01",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 2, 0) AS "02",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 3, 0) AS "03",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 4, 0) AS "04",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 5, 0) AS "05",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 6, 0) AS "06",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 7, 0) AS "07",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 8, 0) AS "08",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 9, 0) AS "09",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 10, 0) AS "10",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 11, 0) AS "11",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 12, 0) AS "12",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 13, 0) AS "13",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 14, 0) AS "14",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 15, 0) AS "15",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 16, 0) AS "16",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 17, 0) AS "17",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 18, 0) AS "18",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 19, 0) AS "19",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 20, 0) AS "20",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 21, 0) AS "21",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 22, 0) AS "22",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 23, 0) AS "23",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 24, 0) AS "24",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 25, 0) AS "25",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 26, 0) AS "26",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 27, 0) AS "27",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 28, 0) AS "28",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 29, 0) AS "29",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 30, 0) AS "30",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 31, 0) AS "31",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 32, 0) AS "32",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 33, 0) AS "33",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 34, 0) AS "34",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 35, 0) AS "35",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 36, 0) AS "36",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 37, 0) AS "37",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 38, 0) AS "38",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 39, 0) AS "39",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 40, 0) AS "40",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 41, 0) AS "41",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 42, 0) AS "42",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 43, 0) AS "43",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 44, 0) AS "44",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 45, 0) AS "45",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 46, 0) AS "46",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 47, 0) AS "47",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 48, 0) AS "48",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 49, 0) AS "49",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 50, 0) AS "50",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 51, 0) AS "51",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 52, 0) AS "52",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 53, 0) AS "53",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 54, 0) AS "54",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 55, 0) AS "55",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 56, 0) AS "56",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 57, 0) AS "57",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 58, 0) AS "58",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 59, 0) AS "59",
            MAKETIME(s.seq+1, 0, 0) AS "next"
        FROM $dbname.seq_0_to_23 s
    ) s,
    $dbname.SessionHistory sh
WHERE sh.user_id = $user
GROUP BY s.Hour;

SELECT
    s.Hour AS "Hour",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`01` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`00`) AS "00",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`02` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`01`) AS "01",
    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`03` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`02`) AS "02",

    SUM(TIME(sh.start_time) < s.`next` AND TIME(sh.end_time) >= s.`59`) AS "59"
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            s.seq AS "Hour",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 0, 0) AS "00",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 1, 0) AS "01",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 2, 0) AS "02",

            MAKETIME(s.seq, 19, 0) AS "19",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 20, 0) AS "20",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 21, 0) AS "21",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 22, 0) AS "22",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 23, 0) AS "23",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 24, 0) AS "24",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 25, 0) AS "25",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 26, 0) AS "26",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 27, 0) AS "27",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 28, 0) AS "28",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 29, 0) AS "29",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 30, 0) AS "30",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 31, 0) AS "31",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 32, 0) AS "32",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 33, 0) AS "33",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 34, 0) AS "34",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 35, 0) AS "35",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 36, 0) AS "36",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 37, 0) AS "37",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 38, 0) AS "38",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 39, 0) AS "39",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 40, 0) AS "40",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 41, 0) AS "41",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 42, 0) AS "42",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 43, 0) AS "43",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 44, 0) AS "44",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 45, 0) AS "45",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 46, 0) AS "46",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 47, 0) AS "47",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 48, 0) AS "48",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 49, 0) AS "49",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 50, 0) AS "50",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 51, 0) AS "51",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 52, 0) AS "52",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 53, 0) AS "53",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 54, 0) AS "54",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 55, 0) AS "55",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 56, 0) AS "56",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 57, 0) AS "57",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 58, 0) AS "58",
            MAKETIME(s.seq, 59, 0) AS "59",
            MAKETIME(s.seq+1, 0, 0) AS "next"
        FROM $dbname.seq_0_to_23 s
    ) s,
    $dbname.SessionHistory sh
WHERE sh.user_id = $user
  AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, sh.timestamp, NOW()) <= 90
GROUP BY s.Hour;

list.definition: SELECT user_id AS __value, username AS __text FROM $dbname.Usernames;
list.label: Profiles
list.name: user
list.query: SELECT user_id AS __value, username AS __text FROM $dbname.Usernames;
